body: OK, so I've seen some players from avicus hacking on OTHER server. But then they use a different profile on avicus. Is this aloud? Should they be banned?
body_tagged: OK, so I've seen some players from avicus hacking on OTHER server. But then they use a different profile on avicus. Is this aloud? Should they be banned?
title: Hacking

replies.body:
If they are NOT hacking on Avicus, it should be fine.
It's not our responsibility if they hack on a different server.
replies.body_tagged:
If they are NOT hacking on Avicus, it should be fine.
It's not our responsibility if they hack on a different server.

replies.body: Thats right but, we can't inform the other server's staff that they are hacking? (if they didn't discover it yet). Just think on we all are a community who love Minecraft and play/managing on servers.
replies.body_tagged: Thats right but, we can't inform the other server's staff that they are hacking? (if they didn't discover it yet). Just think on we all are a community who love Minecraft and play/managing on servers.
